data.meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.
data.sentence: The word فَتَوَلَّ comes from the root و ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.
The word بِمَلُومٍ comes from the root ل و م and is associated with the meanings: (lama)To blame someone for something, accuse.
